Message:
“We wish to speak only with
the chief of your tribe.
We’ll be waiting at the temple
near your settlement.”

That was in the letter sent to me
by the People of the Stone.

My tribe tried to stop me,
but I headed for
the meeting place alone.

No wolf, especially my mother,
would ever turn their back
on such a request.

I made it to the temple,
but...what is this smell?
Is something...rotting...?

Just then, a trail of fire
rose into the air.

The billowing flames surrounded
the temple’s interior
with frightening speed.

So, that rotten stench
was just to cover up
the smell of gunpowder...!

Suddenly, a loud noise
rang out behind me.
Whipping back, I saw one of
the temple’s pillars about to
crash down upon me...

But, that very moment,
someone pushed me
out of harm’s way.

But, she gave no response
to my probing gaze,
as she lied helplessly,
trapped beneath the pillar.
